Summary: change direction blue S through small saturn like disc through glowing yellow ball
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in New Haven

divs: Sighting DetailsI was bored one night and began flicking the back porch light on and off, when i notice what i thought was a satelite tht looked like blue and orange sideways small handweight.. so i went outside. It suddenly changed direction going backwards and stopping at the top middle of my house in relation to me,it transformed from that to a giant yellow ball with star like glistening qualities and a giant blue S right through it and a small saturns disk the same color as the ball, also haveing blue tints. then nearby there were two small barbells all red. on either side. Note this was veterans day but i dont think it matters because it was a serious ufo.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
